manifest.help_text: Path to a CSV manifest comprising 3 columns (sample_id, R1, R2). R1 and R2 columns contain paths to *.fastq.gz files.

reference.help_text: Path to reference genome in FASTA format.

annotation.help_text: Path to genome annotation in GFF format.

trimmer.help_text: Software to use for trimming. Options: fastp.

fastp_args.help_text: Options and arguments that will be supplied to fastp to modify QC behaviour.

multiqc_config.help_text: A multiqc configuration file (yml) that can be used to customise the multiqc behaviour. See https://multiqc.info/docs/getting_started/config/.

bowtie2_args.help_text: Options and arguments that will be supplied to Bowtie2 to modify mapping behaviour.

keep_sorted_bam.help_text: If true, keep the sorted bam file generated from mapping.

keep_dedup_bam.help_text: If true, keep the deduplicated bam file.

htseq_args.help_text: Options and arguments that will be supplied to htseq-count to modify counting behaviour.

samtools_filter_args.help_text:
Arguments supplied to samtools to will be used to filter alignments of interest for counting. Acceptable arguments: -f or -F.
The default will only keep reads that aligned in proper pairs.

monochrome_logs.help_text: Should logs appear in plain (non-coloured) ASCII
